attributes.action: The Astute Class Submarine build all 7 of them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Astute Class Submarine will be the worlds best submarine but we will only have 4 of these The Astute Class Submarine and they are replacing 7   Trafalgar class submarines. But the Mod is considering buying 3 more. But the navy has not had a good history of buying more ships. So I am here to support the purchasing of 3 more submarine.
